column2: "Guh... fuh... you... haha! Can't... you can't... you absolutely can't get past here...!"
"I promised I'd let no one through. If I do that, then she'll be brought back..."
"Haha... please don't make that face. I know... I understand... what I'm doing."
"And that she won't come back...!"
"But... what then? Why? What should I do?!"
"If she's not alive, then there's no meaning. What should I do... what should I...?"
"Theo!"
"Haha, no, that's not possible... she's dead, she can't be here. Isn't that right, Theodore...?"
"She's no more, she won't return. That... that's what I know better than anyone...!"
"That has to be a lie. Yeah, it's a lie. She just looks like her... don't show me that!"
"Disappear! disappear disappear disappeeeeeeeeear!"
"Kyaaa!"
"...Don't move! I'm okay... just, leave it to me."
"Theo..."
"Who?! You, who are you?!"
"That appearance... it's hers... and it's gone...!"
"Don't take me for a fool! Don't take me for a fool!"
"Uwah!"
"Uhhh...! Gggggggghh...!"
"...This is the pain of battle? This like... really freaking hurts...!"
"But, this is what I irresponsibly shoved on to you all this time, huh...?"
"Go away! Go away, you fake! She... she can't possibly be here...!"
"She can't fight... that's why I fought. Yes, I promised!"
"Yes, and because of that promise, I've bound you just like this."
"Even if I didn't do that... well, I'm not one to speak. If I was allowed to do that much then..."
"...It's okay. This, it's Theo's pain... I can't, I have to receive it."
"What is this... what's going on...! Her appearance... and right now... I don't want to see it, I don't...!"
"The me that's become like this, I don't want to be seen...!"
"Why, why is this happening?! This is terrible... I... just, stop it...!"
"...I, I promised! In her stead... for her... I'd fight, fight fight...!"
"She's no longer here... not here anymore... I, I promised so she wouldn't do anything unreasonable... to protect her!"
"Ha, ha, haa, haa!"
"Ha, haha, ahaha, hahahaha!"
"I, I just... I did..."
"Theo. It's enough."
"That promise with me, it's okay to forget it. Even if you can't protect me, I won't get angry. I won't so..."
"So... come back."
"I'm begging you, please come back."
"Yo, good afternoon. So now I'm home? A welcome home would be nice."
"Y... you... I... those injuries...!"
"Be quiet, don't think about trivial things!"
"Ulc... aah, Ulc...!"
"I'm sorry, I'm so sorry! I, what did I do to you...!"
"It's okay Theo. It's okay."
"I didn't understand your pain. I finally do."
"I'm sorry... Theodore. You always shouldered this pain alone."
"...It's okay to rest now. For a little bit, just lay down. If you don't, you won't be able to fight."
"Since forever... you've never opened up to anyone, even at your limit. You'd just do your own thing..."
"Really... you never change. Unless I'm watching, you're hopeless, aren't you...?"
"Wait Ulc! If you run off alone, you'll die!"
"Hey, you! What're you doing?!"
"Ah... sorry about that, Sara. I'm pretty much at my limit."
"When we wake up, you can yell at us both for however long you want, but for now, let us rest..."
"Wait a sec! ...You pushed yourself too hard, idiot."
"Leave this kid to me. Aside from that, we need to find a way to get in through there."
"That's genuinely the last gate, so don't take it easy yet."
"It seems forcing it down is impossible. If someone can enter, it means there's some sweet spot."
"You... You're Xion's relative, right? Did she tell you a way to open the door?"
"A relative...? Even if you spring that on me, I don't know..."
"<%me>... and Matoi... are the people I've chosen."
"Xion! You're within this gate, right? Open it!"
"What's within is the center. Inside me, the Mothership's core. I will guide my kin, who holds the key."
"Enter, the key is in your hand. That is, it exists there. It's rightfully yours..."
"Something... that's rightfully mine..."
"<%me>... I want you to say its name. It's something you should know."
"What everyone's looked for, that you grabbed, that's been repaired, but should have been lost. The name of what's hers."
"All of it, for this moment, guiding it back for her to call it back now... it's name..."
"Clarissa."
"...Clarissa."
"Yes. The White Tin... Clarissa."
"...Let's go, <%me>."
"Xion is calling out to us."
"<%me>. And Xion's kin."
"Our preparations end here. From here on out, it's the completely unpredictable, gloves off final match."
"That's why.. .umm... do your best!"
"Yes!"
"Quest progress has been saved."
